response.overview: Backbone Valley... a quiet old town where its dwellers live in frith. But many moons ago, the valley was grounds for the most legendary of duels between the most infamous of foes: El Diablo and El Escorpión. The gunslinger, El Diablo, emerged victorious.  Years later, rumblings of the two have quelled, and El Diablo now works to keep the peace as the town’s sheriff under the pseudonym Mac. However, when word of El Escorpión’s return spreads like wildfire, Mac is forced to confront his past, or else lose all that he has come to love.
response.tagline: This playground ain't big enough for the two of us...
response.title: Devil's Pardon
